description: Describes the specified attribute of the specified snapshot. You can specify only one attribute at a time. For more information about EBS snapshots, see Amazon EBS snapshots in the Amazon EBS User Guide.

parameters.name: Attribute
parameters.description: The snapshot attribute you would like to view.

parameters.name: SnapshotId
parameters.description: The ID of the EBS snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotId
nested_items.description: The ID of the EBS snapshot.

nested_items.name: CreateVolumePermissions
nested_items.description: The users and groups that have the permissions for creating volumes from the snapshot.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account to be added or removed.

nested_items.name: Group
nested_items.description: The group to be added or removed. The possible value is all.
